A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's pretty enjoyable if you turn your brain off due to its stunning visuals and action-filled scenes. There's not a lot of downtime for this film\, and when there is\, it usually is cut short by humor that is extremely direct and in-your-face\, similarly to the Prequel Trilogy. The messages the movie are trying to tell are extremely direct too\, with its\" tell\, don't show\" approach to them\, treating the audience like they're a bunch of idiots. Some of the plot points are non-sensical and invalidate everything that the Original Trilogy accomplished in its universe.
